channel.title: 508 Unhandled Buttom + Giving Full NPC Attack Source For Whoever Explain
channel.description: i am having a 508 problem: i have open an [b]interface[/b] inside the interface when i press a buttom it comes like this in the server [player name goes here] Unhandled buttom: 640, 18:0 i whould like to explain to know to do it in any buttom ( i want you to tell me where to put my case and what the name of my case )

i am having a 508 problem:
i have open an interface
inside the interface when i press a buttom it comes like this in the server
